name: INV04 - Báo cáo tồn kho theo kho
query:
SELECT 
    ti.item_group AS 'Nhóm sản phẩm',
    tsle.item_code AS 'Mã sản phẩm',
    ti.item_name AS 'Tên sản phẩm',
    tsle.stock_uom AS 'ĐVT',
    tsle.actual_qty + tsle.qty_after_transaction AS 'Đầu kỳ',
    CASE 
        WHEN tsle.actual_qty > 0 THEN ABS(tsle.actual_qty)
        WHEN tsle.actual_qty < 0 THEN 0
    END AS 'SL nhập',
    CASE 
        WHEN tsle.actual_qty > 0 THEN 0
        WHEN tsle.actual_qty < 0 THEN ABS(tsle.actual_qty)
    END AS 'SL xuất',
    tsle.qty_after_transaction AS 'Cuối kỳ'
FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` tsle 
LEFT JOIN `tabWarehouse` tw ON tw.name = tsle.warehouse 
LEFT JOIN `tabItem` ti ON ti.name = tsle.item_code
WHERE tsle.company = %(company)s
    AND tsle.posting_date BETWEEN DATE( %(start_date)s) AND DATE(%(end_date)s)
    AND tsle.warehouse = %(warehouse)s
report_name: INV04 - Báo cáo tồn kho theo kho
